situation:
The pendulum bob has a weight of 44
Newtons and is released from rest in the position shown,
when Ø = 0° and radius R = 0.90 m.

subquestions.question: Which of the ff. most nearly gives the tension on the string AB when Ø = 0°?
Which of the ff. most nearly gives the tension of string AB when Ø = 45°?
Which of the ff. most nearly gives the tension of string AB when Ø = 90°?
